source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT CAST(MAX(RunId) AS VARCHAR(256)) as RunId FROM Mgmt.Log_RunId

sqlReaderQuery.value:
/*  Log The Status as Finish in Execution Results */
UPDATE MGMT
     SET FullJobStatus='Finish'
	from Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results Mgmt
   WHERE LogId=(SELECT MAX(LogId)
                  FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
				 WHERE RunId=@{activity('GetRunId').output.firstRow.RunId})
/* Log the End Time on Run Id */
  UPDATE MGMT
      SET EndDateTime=getdate()
	 FROM Mgmt.Log_RunId Mgmt
	WHERE RunId=@{activity('GetRunId').output.firstRow.RunId}

SELECT 'na'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DELETE FROM Stg.Avms_CandidateDetails

SELECT ShortCode
  FROM Stg.CandidateConfig
WHERE SourceDb='RAAv1'
    AND Category='Ethnicity'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @CAID BIGINT

EXECUTE @CAID= [dbo].[GenerateCopyActivityId] @{pipeline().parameters.RunId}, 'RAAv1','Eth'

SELECT @CAID as CAID

INSERT INTO Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
	  (
	    RunId
	   ,StepNo
	   ,StoredProcedureName
	   ,ADFTaskType
	   ,StartDateTime
	   ,Execution_Status
	  )
  SELECT 
        @{pipeline().parameters.RunId}
	   ,'Step-5'
	   ,'NA'
	   ,'ImportAVMSCandidateEthToDM'
	   ,getdate()
	   ,0

SELECT 'N/A'

DECLARE @LogID int

   SELECT @LogID=MAX(LogId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   WHERE ADFTaskType='ImportAVMSCandidateEthToDM'
     AND RunId=@{pipeline().parameters.RunId}

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{pipeline().parameters.RunId}

SELECT 1
SELECT  SourceTableName as Table_Name, SourceSchemaName as Schema_Name FROM [Mtd].[SourceConfigForImport] Where SourceDatabaseName='AVMSPlus' and IsEnabled=1

declare @cols varchar(max)

SELECT  @cols = STUFF
    (
        ( 
            SELECT DISTINCT '], [' + column_name
            FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
            where table_name='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
                 and table_schema='@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}'
            FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 2, ''
    ) + ']';

SELECT @cols Columns

Declare @cols varchar(max)

SET @Cols= '@{variables('SourceColumnList')}'

Declare @SourceQuery Varchar(max)


Declare @collist VARCHAR(MAX)

SET @collist=
 STUFF
    (
        ( 
SELECT ','+LTRIM(RTRIM(ConfigList))
FROM
(SELECT VALUE as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToInclude,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='AvmsPlus'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}'
	) AS SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                      from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
				     where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))
					  FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 1, ''
    ) ;
/* Apply Transformations */
SET @collist= 
REPLACE(
REPLACE(
REPLACE(
REPLACE(
@COLLIST
,'[DATEOFBIRTH]',
'(DATEDIFF(YEAR,[DateOfBirth],GETDATE())-(CASE WHEN DATEADD(YY,DATEDIFF(YEAR,[DateOfBirth],GETDATE()),[DateOfBirth]) > GETDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) as [Age]'
)
,'[Postcode]'
,'(LEFT([postcode], CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('' '', [postcode]) = 0 THEN LEN([postcode]) ELSE CHARINDEX('' '', [postcode])-1 END)) as [PostCode]'
)
,'[EthnicOrigin]'
,'(@{pipeline().parameters.RunId}+EthnicOrigin) as EID'
)
,'[CandidateEthnicOriginId]'
,'(@{pipeline().parameters.RunId}+CandidateEthnicOriginId) as EID'
)

SET @SourceQuery='select ' + @collist + ' from [@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}]'; 

SELECT @SourceQuery SourceQuery
@{activity('GetImportSelectQuery').output.firstRow.SourceQuery}

preCopyScript.value: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = N'avms_@{item().TABLE_NAME}' AND TABLE_SCHEMA=N'Stg') DROP TABLE [Stg].[avms_@{item().TABLE_NAME}]

sqlReaderQuery.value:
INSERT INTO Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
	  (
	    RunId
	   ,StepNo
	   ,StoredProcedureName
	   ,ADFTaskType
	   ,StartDateTime
	   ,Execution_Status
	  )
  SELECT 
        @{pipeline().parameters.RunId}
	   ,'Step-5'
	   ,'NA'
	   ,'ImportAvmsToDM'
	   ,getdate()
	   ,0

SELECT 'N/A'

DECLARE @LogID int

   SELECT @LogID=MAX(LogId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   WHERE ADFTaskType='ImportAvmsToDM'
     AND RunId=@{pipeline().parameters.RunId}

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{pipeline().parameters.RunId}

SELECT 1

SELECT  SourceTableName as Table_Name, SourceSchemaName as Schema_Name FROM [Mtd].[SourceConfigForImport] Where SourceDatabaseName='EmpInc' and IsEnabled=1

declare @cols varchar(max)

SELECT  @cols = STUFF
    (
        ( 
            SELECT DISTINCT '], [' + column_name
            FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
            where table_name='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
                 and table_schema='@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}'
            FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 2, ''
    ) + ']';

SELECT @cols Columns

Declare @cols varchar(max)

SET @Cols= '@{variables('SourceColumnList')}'

Declare @SourceQuery Varchar(max)


Declare @collist VARCHAR(MAX)

SET @collist=
 STUFF
    (
        ( 
SELECT ','+LTRIM(RTRIM(ConfigList))
FROM
(SELECT VALUE as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToInclude,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='EmpInc'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}'
	) AS SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                      from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
				     where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))
					  FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 1, ''
    ) ;

SET @SourceQuery='select ' + @collist + ' from [@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}]'; 

SELECT @SourceQuery SourceQuery, @Collist ColumnList

INSERT INTO Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
	  (
	    RunId
	   ,StepNo
	   ,StoredProcedureName
	   ,ADFTaskType
	   ,StartDateTime
	   ,Execution_Status
	  )
  SELECT 
        @{variables('RunId')}
	   ,'Step-5'
	   ,'NA'
	   ,'ImportEmployerIncentivesToDMStaging-'+'@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
	   ,getdate()
	   ,0

SELECT 'N/A'

   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{variables('RunId')}

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SourceQuery as string,
	ColumnList as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ($SourceQuery),
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		SourseSK as integer,
		BinaryId as string,
		TypeCode as string,
		IdamUserId as string,
		UserType as string,
		UserName as string,
		UserEmail as string,
		UserCreatedTimeStamp as string,
		LastSignedInTimeStamp as string,
		EmployerAccountId as string,
		Ukprn as string,
		RunId as long,
		AsDm_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		AsDm_UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
